content.text:
# Battle of Kalyan

The Battles of Kalyan occurred between the Mughal Empire and the Maratha Kingdom between 1683 and 1684. Bahadur Khan of the Mughal Empire defeated the Maratha army under Tukoji and took over Kalyan. The Marathas attempted a counter-offensive but failed, as they were repulsed by Mughal forces. Sambhaji later attempted a counterattack, defeating Bahadur Khan. Another attempt was made by Bahadur khan to recapture the fort, but was repulsed by Hambirrao Mohite.
See also
*Battle of Wai
*Sacking of Burhanpur (1681)
